site_name: 22 + 22A Cheam Common RoadWorcester ParkKT4 8RW
description: Application to vary condition 1 (Approved drawings) of planning permission Ref: DM2023/01749 for the "Change of use from a mini cab office (Class E) to a coffee shop (Class E), erection of a single storey rear extension, alterations to the shop front and provision of side entrance door to provide access to first floor flat. Conversion of loft space, alterations to existing roofline, including a dormer extension to side and rear roof slopes, installation of roof lights to front roof slope and erection of a detached single storey outbuilding to the rear" to allow erection of a first floor rear extension and alterations to ground floor rear extension.
